title.value: Селекция ярового чеснока в условиях Республики Беларусь
Evaluation of spring garlic breeding material in the Republic of Belarus

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Kupreenko, N.P., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on the evaluation of productivity of spring garlic (Allium sativum L.) clones. Clones 514 and 517 are best suited to create varieties with little amount of cloves in the bulb. For creating of high-yielding varieties of spring garlic is recommended to use samples of 516 and 517. Clones 516, 517, 514, 510, 515 and 518 were noted by a sufficiently large bulb in comparison with other samples of the collection nursery. In course of three years of studies the above listed numbers showed relatively stable yields compared to other clones, in connection with which these samples were included in the clonal nursery.
